'''Colin Duriez''' ([[19 July]] [[1947]]) is the author of several books and articles relating to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and the [[Inklings]]. 
==Bibliography==
===Books===
* [[1992]]: ''[[The Tolkien and Middle-earth Handbook]]''
* [[2001]]: ''[[The Inklings Handbook]]'' (with David Porter) 
* [[2001]]: ''[[Tolkien and The Lord of the Rings]]''
* [[2003]]: ''[[Tolkien and C.S. Lewis|Tolkien and C.S. Lewis: The Gift of Friendship]]''
* [[2012]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: The Making of a Legend]]''
* [[2012]]: ''[[Amazing & Extraordinary facts: J.R.R.Tolkien]]''
* [[2015]]: ''[[Bedeviled: Lewis, Tolkien and the Shadow of Evil]]'' 
* [[2015]]: ''[[The Oxford Inklings: Lewis, Tolkien and Their Circle]]''
